RTCRtpReceiverTransform.summary:
The transform property of the object is used to insert a transform stream () running in a worker thread into the receiver pipeline.
This allows stream transforms to be applied to encoded video and audio frames as they arrive from the packetizer (before they are played/rendered).

remarks.para:
The transform that is to be added is defined using an and its associated .
If the transform is set in the peer connection track event handler, the transform stream will receive the first full incoming frame for the track.

RTCRtpReceiverTransform.value: A <!-- or {{domxref("SFrameTransform")}} -->, or null if the receiver has no associated transform stream.
